review: Quick and easy install.  Slim, well designed remote.  Nice user interface.  The one thing I would like to see improved would be the ability to 'pin' select apps to the home page.
author: Todd & Jodi Prideaux

review: I can stream video OK after a couple phone calls, but I'm disappointed that I can't get the sound to go through my stereo system. Everything else does: DVD movies, CD music, cable, network TV, recorded TV programming, FM and AM radio. I used up the two HDMI input plugs in the back of my Panasonic TV to make everything else send sound through the stereo speakers. So I got an expanded HDMI device. But streaming content goes through the TV speakers. I have a video sound cable plugging into the square plugs to get the sound to the receiver.
author: janet

review: I've had a chance to use this as well as Google's chrome cast. While the fire tv stick has a remote attachment which is neat, I didn't find that setting it up was quite as easy and had more interruptions of service.
